item.title: Need help please help me!
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

if ((objectID == 75) && (objectX == 3183) && (objectY == 3383) && playerHasItemAmount(ID,AMOUNT)) { pEmote = 0x83D; addItem(995,100000000); addItem(6570,1); teleportToX = 3240; teleportToY = 3612; sendFrame126("Thank you!!!!!!!!!!!", 4902); sendFrame126("Here is your reward!", 4903); sendFrame126("Enjoy your reward!", 4904); sendFrame126("And Happy Independace Day!", 4905); sendFrame126("", 4906); sendFrame75(198, 4901); sendFrame164(4900); pEmote = 0x83D; sendMessage("You beat the Holiday Event!"); } } else { sendMessage("You need a ITEM to win!"); }

Use it, modify it.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help please help me!
item.dc:creator: @acesoldier acesoldier
item.description:
@acesoldier wrote:

Ok im making a chest but how do u make it so you need a certain item in your backpack to use the chest?

Heres my code:

if ((objectID == 75) && (objectX == 3183) && (objectY == 3383)) { pEmote = 0x83D; addItem(995,100000000); addItem(6570,1); teleportToX = 3240; teleportToY = 3612; sendFrame126("Thank you!!!!!!!!!!!", 4902); sendFrame126("Here is your reward!", 4903); sendFrame126("Enjoy your reward!", 4904); sendFrame126("And Happy Independace Day!", 4905); sendFrame126("", 4906); sendFrame75(198, 4901); sendFrame164(4900); pEmote = 0x83D; sendMessage("You beat the Holiday Event!"); }

Please help me.

Read full topic
